inclusion.criterion: stage IVB, recurrent or metastatic cervical cancer
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: recurrent cervical cancer undergoing salvage surgery and receiving P-HDFL as adjuvant therapy
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has stage IVB, recurrent or metastatic cervical cancer treated with P-HDFL. However, he is undergoing salvage surgery and receiving P-HDFL as adjuvant therapy, which triggers exclusion.
